module.title: Ginzzzu's Music Deck
module.description: Vertical music deck for Foundry VTT with fast access to playlists and tracks.

playlistButtonSize.name: Deck width
playlistButtonSize.hint: Size of playlist buttons (when collapsed) and the search field.

maxExpandWidth.name: Max expand width
maxExpandWidth.hint: Maximum width of playlist and track buttons when expanded on hover (in pixels).

paletteColor.hint: Color used in the Music Deck palette. You can enter a hex code or install the "Color Picker" module to choose colors via a picker.

useFolderColor.name: Use folder color
useFolderColor.hint: If enabled, playlist button background is taken from its folder color.

collapseOthers.name: Collapse other playlists
collapseOthers.hint: When you expand one playlist, all others will automatically collapse.

truncateFavoritePlaylists.name: Truncate favorite playlist names
truncateFavoritePlaylists.hint: If disabled, favorite playlists and "Favorites" always show the full name (up to the maximum width).

ui.favoritesTooltip: Favorite tracks of Ginzzzu's Music Deck
ui.favoritesDialogContent: All tracks will be removed from the "Favorites" playlist, but will remain in their original playlists.
ui.aliasEditNoAlias: Set a name for this favorite track
